page.title: 16QUESTIONNAIRE
page.content: The days of country people never moving out of their own village seem to be over.The poor local 'bus service was used by only 30% of the people interviewed and the vast majority had their own cars. Most people had visited other parts of the country , and 66% had been abroad for a holiday. The countries that they had visited were mainly European,although one family had been to America several times. Most of the younger people asked, expected that they would have a holiday this year,but some of the older ones said that they weren't bothered about a holiday,or that they could not afford one. Of the children in our class,many were going away to stay with friends or relations;several were going camping and 25% were flying abroad to their holiday destination.
